title: JSON schema for OctoberCMS list configuration

list.description: A configuration array or reference to a list column definition file.

modelClass.description: The model class name, the list data is loaded from this model.

filter.description: Filter configuration, either as an array with the configuration or a reference to a filter configuration file.

recordUrl.description: Link each list record to another page, e.g., users/update:id.

recordOnClick.description: Custom JavaScript code to execute when clicking on a record.

noRecordsMessage.description: Message to display when no records are found.

deleteMessage.description: Message to display when records are bulk deleted.

noRecordsDeletedMessage.description: Message to display when a bulk delete action is triggered, but no records were deleted.

recordsPerPage.description: Records to display per page, use 0 for no pages.

perPageOptions.description: Options for number of items per page.

toolbar.description: Reference to a Toolbar Widget configuration file, or an array with configuration.

buttons.description: A reference to a controller partial file with the toolbar buttons. Eg: _list_toolbar.htm

search.description: Reference to a Search Widget configuration file, or an array with configuration.

prompt.description: A placeholder to display when there is no active search, can refer to a localization string.

mode.description: Defines the search strategy to either contain all words, any word or exact phrase. Supported options: all, any, exact.

scope.description: Specifies a query scope method defined in the list model to apply to the search query. The first argument will contain the query object (as per a regular scope method), the second will contain the search term, and the third will be an array of the columns to be searched.

searchOnEnter.description: Setting this to true will make the search widget wait for the Enter key to be pressed before it starts searching. Default: false.

showSorting.description: Displays the sorting link on each column.

defaultSort.description: Sets a default sorting column and direction.

showCheckboxes.description: Displays checkboxes next to each record.

showSetup.description: Displays the list column set up button.

customViewPath.description: Specify a custom view path to override partials used by the list.

customPageName.description: Specify a custom variable name to use in the page URL for paginated records.
